desc: Hi guys,I am after a developer who can create me a Tinder style application based on the technology specified in the title (Ionic, Angular, Firebase etc.). You can provide me with your thoughts, pros/cons as to this if you wish.The Project will be conveyed into phases, starting with phase 1 & 2. More specific details and phases/work will go to the one whom I have selected.Tinder Style App (Phase 1):1. Both X and Y must swipe/like each other in order to communicate (just like tinder).Example: People looking for a job, X employer , Y employee.Tinder Style App (Phase 2):1. Only X can see Y and swipe/like if so desired.Example: Some one looking for help (Y) and the other has accepted (X).Details:1. This project will be confidential and the freelancer whom I have selected must sign an non-disclosure agreement.2. All copyrights, ideas, source code etc. must be provided to me and only belong to me.3. Details as to how and why certain steps have been utilised (this is important to make sure the following phases 3, 4 and so on (later introduced, priced and discussed) will fit within the application).4. Developer to assist me with styling and recommendations.5. Application to be designed/based on Tinder for now.6. Application will need to run online (website), and applications for Mobile users, hence Ionic etc. so no double building is required.7.  Tinder application will need to provide online chat services and file attachments (I am happy to integrate third party service -  [url removed, login to view]).8. Paid advertising will need to be integrated within the application.Looking forward to working with you.
title: Tinder Style Application (Ionic, Angular, Firebase, etc.)

Also as a seller you will only be able to publish the regular pictures of the house as any other website or app, you will also be able to publish the link to the online broker that sells the house so that the buyers can be able to get the necessary information on the house, and last but not least you will be able to publish the date and time of when you or your broker are going to do a LIVE BROADCAST of the house that you ant to sell to get buyers more interested before coming to the real actual in person house view.If you register as a buyer you will be able to search for the type of house and the adress of where you want to buy a house. desc: We require a VPN client software written for Windows/Mac/Android and iOS. It should be based on OpenVPN for Windows and Android (IKEV2 for iOS and Mac) we already have servers setup , the client could utilize a cross/hybrid platform. Full API with documentation will be provided. Design guidelines will be provided so it matches our website link will be provided. The design should be flat ui and very modern and sleek. See examples NordVPN and SaferVPN to name a few.1.1 Login -> 2UsernamePasswordRemember me checkbox1.2 Register (registrations on mobile gives the user a trial plan) -> 2.1EmailPasswordI agree to the terms of service2. Home screenAccount details (via API)Welcome, $usernameExpiry dateActive subscription (monthly etc)Amount of open ports on account only for Windows/MacYour location + IP should be shown. When connected to the VPN, it should change and say you're protectedQuick connect button, connects to the closest server2.1 If the user does not have a plan it should show nothing but the plans available pulled from our API. But it should also show if you have a plan so you can extend your plan when you click buy you get directed to browser link. On mobile it should allow the app for in app purchases to easily get a plan.3. Server selectionList all servers using the API aswell as download the config files from our servers and automatically check for new and updated ones and their country flag + server/city nameSort all servers on region (America, Europe, Oceania etc)Make a search bar to search for a specific serverDisplay the ping to each server (this could be a manual check by the user, by clicking a refresh button)Clicking one of the servers will make it connect4. SettingsEnable/disable the ping "check"Enable/disable client logs only for Windows/MacDNS leak fix (Push a specific dns to the adapter), only for Windows/MacCopy log file to clipboard or save log file option only for Windows/MacConnect on startup option only for Windows/MacEnable/disable notificationsNotifications on Android/iOS for example that your account is about to expire.
title: VPN client software for Windows/Mac and iOS/Android
